label: ham
subject: svn commit: samba r22362 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/libsmb: .
body: If the element of spirit is naturally weak in him the change is speedily accomplished, but if he have a good deal, then the power of music weakening the spirit renders him excitable;—on the least provocation he flames up at once, and is speedily extinguished; instead of having spirit he grows irritable and passionate and is quite impracticable.
